task.title: Enable Login Using LinkedIn
task.shortdesc: Connect your LinkedIn account to Livefyre to allow users to use their LinkedIn logins to interact with Apps on your site.

context.p: To enable login using a LinkedIn account:

step.cmd: In Livefyre > Integration Settings > Livefyre Identity > LinkedIn switch the Enable LinkedIn Login toggle to On.
Enter the LinkedIn Client ID and LinkedIn Client Secret.

step.info: The LinkedIn Client ID and LinkedIn Client Secret are listed in the LinkedIn app details page.
